column2: "Mma nnyɛ dzinn
column3: ao m'ayɛyi Nyankopɔn

column2: "Na emumuyɛfo na ndaadaafo ebue hɔn anomu etsia me: Wɔdze ator gyirama akeka mo ho nsɛm."
"Wɔdze ɔtan nsɛm so twa mo ho hyia
column3: Na wɔnye me dzi ako kwa."

column2: "Wɔdze ɔtan hyɛ mo dɔ ananmu: Naaso emi dze
column3: mobɔ mpaa ma hɔn."

column2: "Na wɔdze bɔn hyɛ me papa ananmu
column3: Na okyir hyɛ mo dɔ ananmu."

column2: "Fa omumuyɛnyi si no do panyin: Na ma ɔtamfo mbɔ no sombo."
"Sɛ wobua no atsɛn a
column3: ma ondzi fɔ; Na ma ne mpaabɔ ndan bɔn mma no
column5: "Ma ne nda nsuar; Na ma obi mfa no nhwɛdo dwuma no."

column2: "Ma ne mba nyɛ ngyanka
column3: Na ne yer nyɛ okunafo."

column2: "Ma ne mba nyɛ akobɔfo
column3: na wɔnserɛserɛ adze; Na ma womfi hɔn amamfo do nkɔhwehwɛ edziban."

column2: "Ma ɔpempensinyi nsa nka dza ɔwɔ nyinara; Na ma ananaben mfow n'edwumadze."
"Mma obiara nntsen mbɔbɔrhu nndu no do; Nkyii so mma obiara nnhu ne ngyanka mbɔbɔr."
"Ma wontwa n'asefo mfi hɔ; Ma wɔmpepa hɔn edzin wɔ mbasantsen a odzi do no mu."
"Ma wɔnkaa n'egyanom emumuyɛ wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column3: Na mma wɔmmpepa ne na no bɔn ara da."

column2: "Ma ɔnda EWURADZE enyim daa
column3: Ama oeetwa hɔn nkaa efi asaase do."

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔannkaa dɛ ɔbɛkyerɛ mbɔbɔrhu
column3: Na ohiahiaa nyimpa ɔbɔbɔnyi na ohianyi ho

column2: "Nyew
column3: ɔdɔɔ ndom
column4: na ɔbaa no do; Na n'enyi anngye nhyira mu

column2: "Ofuraa ndom so dɛ ne tam
column3: Na ɔbaa ne yafun mu dɛ nsu
column4: Na ne mbiew mu dɛ ngo."

column2: "Ma ɔnyɛ no dɛ tam a ofura
column3: Ma ɔnnonom nkɔ no honam mu dɛ nsu."

column2: "Iyi nye m'atamfo hɔn akatua a ofi EWURADZE hɔ
column3: Na hɔn a wɔka me kra ho nsɛmbɔn no hɔndze."

column2: "Na ɔwo
column3: Ao Nyankopɔn
column5: dzi ma me wɔ wo dzin ntsi: Ɔnam dɛ wo mbɔbɔrhu ye ntsi

column2: "Na meyɛ ɔbɔbɔnyi na ohianyi
column3: Na m'akoma epira wɔ mo mu."

column2: "Mokɔ dɛ nwinwin a no mu atwe: Wɔtow me kɔ sor ba ase dɛ abɛbɛw."
"Mbuadadzi ntsi m'anankoroma him biribiriw; Na mo honam mu seradze asa."
"Madan ɔsesɛba so ama hɔn: Hɔn enyi bɔ mo do ara a
column3: wɔwosow hɔn tsir."

column2: "Ao EWURADZE
column3: me Nyankopɔn
column5: Dua wo mbɔbɔrhu do gye me nkwa:"

column2: "Ama woeehu dɛ wo nsa nye yi
column3: Dɛ ɔwo

column2: "Hɔn dze ma wɔndom
column3: na ɔwo dze hyira: Wɔsoɛr a

column2: "Ma m'atamfo nhyɛ enyimguase
column3: Na ma womfura hɔnankasa hɔn enyito dɛ tam."

column2: "Medze m'ano bɛda EWURADZE ase kɛse; Nyew
column3: mibeyi no ayɛw wɔ nyimpadodow mu."

column2: "Osiandɛ obegyina ohianyi ne nsa enyimfa
column3: Dɛ ɔregye no nkwa efi hɔn a wobu ne kra atsɛn no nsa."
